  • Method Details

    • createRequest

      public String createRequest(Date registeredDate, String description, int state, String nameCollaborator, String requestArea, String id, String idCollaborator)
      Creates a new request and adds it to the request list.
      Parameters:
      registeredDate - The date the request was registered.
      description - A description of the request.
      state - The state of the request.
      nameCollaborator - The name of the collaborator making the request.
      requestArea - The area of the request.
      id - The ID of the request.
      idCollaborator - The ID of the collaborator.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the request was successfully registered.

    • createCollaborator

      public String createCollaborator(String id, String name, String email, String extension)
      Creates a new collaborator and adds them to the collaborator list.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the collaborator.
      name - The name of the collaborator.
      email - The email of the collaborator.
      extension - The extension of the collaborator.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the collaborator was successfully registered.

    • createKnowledgeProject

      public String createKnowledgeProject(String id, String name, int state, Date clasifingDate, int priorityProject, String leader, String suggestName, int impactedCommunity)
      Creates a new knowledge management project and adds it to the project list.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project.
      name - The name of the project.
      state - The state of the project.
      clasifingDate - The classification date of the project.
      priorityProject - The priority of the project.
      leader - The leader of the project.
      suggestName - The suggested name for the project.
      impactedCommunity - The impacted community of the project.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the project was successfully created.

    • processTransformation

      public String processTransformation(String id, String name, int state, Date clasifingDate, int priorityProject, Date estimatedClosingDate, String leader, String processCode)
      Creates a new process transformation project and adds it to the project list.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project.
      name - The name of the project.
      state - The state of the project.
      clasifingDate - The classification date of the project.
      priorityProject - The priority of the project.
      estimatedClosingDate - The estimated closing date of the project.
      leader - The leader of the project.
      processCode - The process code of the project.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the project was successfully created.

    • consultInformation

      public String[][] consultInformation(Date date)
      Consults information about projects led by collaborators after a certain date.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      A 2D array with information about the projects and their leaders.

      dateMax - The maximum date of the range.
